item.title: NAACP files lawsuit against Texas over new congressional map
item.description: NAACP files lawsuit against Texas for new congressional map, saying it discriminates against voters of color.

item.title: 1 dead, 6 injured after gunman opens fire on sidewalk: 'Sickening and unacceptable'
item.description: The gunman fled in a vehicle and remains at large, the chief said. Authorities are working to identify the suspect, he said.

item.title: WATCH: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce announce engagement
item.description: The pop icon and NFL star shared the news in an Instagram post Tuesday, writing in the caption, "Your English teacher and your gym teacher are getting...

item.title: Abrego Garcia's attorneys ask to reopen his immigration case to seek asylum
item.description: Attorneys for Kilmar Abrego Garcia have filed an emergency motion to reopen his immigration case to seek asylum, according to a court filing.

item.title: WATCH: Legal battle continues over Kilmar Abrego Garcia's potential deportation
item.description: ABC News’ Jack Date says the legal battle surrounding Abrego Garcia’s potential deportation will likely continue for a while.
